chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: The staticsecurity plugin allows you to define the policies which apply for certain users. The policies are statically defined in a XML file (hence the name). These policies can be linked to users which can also defined in the XML file or which are obtained through code (for example linking to a user database or LDAP store).
This plugin also includes an example which adds a custom policy and makes that available in the SecurityContext.
